E

EAddMovieController - Class in application
This class allows employees to add new movies to the system.
EAddMovieController() - Constructor for class application.EAddMovieController
 
EAddProjectionController - Class in application
This class allows employees to upload new projections for any existing movie.
EAddProjectionController() - Constructor for class application.EAddProjectionController
 
EBookingController - Class in application
This class gives the employee access to the cinema room representation for a given projection time.
EBookingController() - Constructor for class application.EBookingController
 
ECinemaRoomController - Class in application
This class gives the employee access to this available and booked seats for a given projection.
ECinemaRoomController() - Constructor for class application.ECinemaRoomController
 
EHomeController - Class in application
This class uses methods to give the employee access to all the functionalities required in this cinema booking system.
EHomeController() - Constructor for class application.EHomeController
 
email - Variable in class application.CUpdateProfileController
A reference to the TextField with fx:id "email" in the corresponding fxml file
EMovieAddProjectionController - Class in application
This class contains methods and fields to display add a new projection for a given movie, directly from this movie poage.
EMovieAddProjectionController() - Constructor for class application.EMovieAddProjectionController
 
EMovieController - Class in application
This class uses methods to display all the information relative to this selected movie from the comboBox in the previous page.
EMovieController() - Constructor for class application.EMovieController
 
ERatingsListController - Class in application
This class uses methods to display the ratings of each movie.
ERatingsListController() - Constructor for class application.ERatingsListController
 
export() - Method in class application.Database
Returns all the projections in the database as well as booked and available seats
export - Variable in class application.EHomeController
Defines the private Label export.
exportProjections(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.EHomeController
Exports all projections information such as movie title, date, time, booked and available seats to a text file in this project.
